MajorArcana.name: The Fool
MajorArcana.interpretation: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life. Today is a day to embrace adventure and take a leap of faith. Remain open to unexpected opportunities.

MajorArcana.name: The Magician
MajorArcana.interpretation: Skill, resourcefulness, manifestation. Focus your energy on what you can create today. Use your talents to solve challenges.

MajorArcana.name: The High Priestess
MajorArcana.interpretation: Intuition, wisdom, hidden knowledge. Pay attention to your inner voice. Meditation or quiet reflection may reveal important insights.

MajorArcana.name: The Empress
MajorArcana.interpretation: Abundance, creativity, nurturing. Today is ideal for creative projects or connecting with nature. Nurture yourself and others.

MajorArcana.name: The Emperor
MajorArcana.interpretation: Stability, authority, structure. Focus on planning and organizing your tasks. Take responsibility for your goals and decisions.

MajorArcana.name: The Hierophant
MajorArcana.interpretation: Tradition, guidance, learning. Seek wisdom from trusted mentors or established practices. Today may bring opportunities to learn or teach.

MajorArcana.name: The Lovers
MajorArcana.interpretation: Relationships, choices, harmony. Pay attention to your connections and make choices aligned with your values. Emotional balance is key today.

MajorArcana.name: The Chariot
MajorArcana.interpretation: Determination, focus, control. Channel your energy toward a specific goal. Overcome obstacles with discipline and confidence.

MajorArcana.name: Strength
MajorArcana.interpretation: Courage, patience, inner strength. Face challenges with calm and compassion. This is a day to tame fears and assert gentle control.

MajorArcana.name: The Hermit
MajorArcana.interpretation: Introspection, solitude, guidance. Take time to reflect on your path. Seek clarity within rather than outside yourself.

MajorArcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
MajorArcana.interpretation: Change, cycles, destiny. Life may bring unexpected events. Adapt and stay flexible, the wheel is turning in your favor.

MajorArcana.name: Justice
MajorArcana.interpretation: Fairness, truth, balance. Focus on decisions and accountability. Seek harmony in conflicts and consider long-term consequences.

MajorArcana.name: The Hanged Man
MajorArcana.interpretation: Pause, surrender, perspective. Let go of control and see things from a new angle. Patience will bring insights.

MajorArcana.name: Death
MajorArcana.interpretation: Transformation, endings, renewal. Embrace change and release what no longer serves you. Today is a day for rebirth and new beginnings.

MajorArcana.name: Temperance
MajorArcana.interpretation: Balance, moderation, harmony. Seek equilibrium in actions and emotions. Integrate opposites and avoid extremes today.

MajorArcana.name: The Devil
MajorArcana.interpretation: Attachment, temptation, materialism. Be mindful of unhealthy patterns or obsessions. Awareness allows liberation.

MajorArcana.name: The Tower
MajorArcana.interpretation: Upheaval, revelation, awakening. Expect sudden insights or disruptions. Use them as a catalyst for growth and clarity.

MajorArcana.name: The Star
MajorArcana.interpretation: Hope, inspiration, serenity. Focus on your dreams and allow positivity to guide your actions. Renewal and faith are present today.

MajorArcana.name: The Moon
MajorArcana.interpretation: Illusion, intuition, subconscious. Trust your instincts and pay attention to dreams or hidden motives. Navigating uncertainty is key.

MajorArcana.name: The Sun
MajorArcana.interpretation: Joy, vitality, success. Celebrate achievements and share happiness. Positive energy encourages growth and clarity.

MajorArcana.name: Judgement
MajorArcana.interpretation: Reflection, reckoning, awakening. Assess your actions and decisions. Today encourages self-evaluation and spiritual growth.

MajorArcana.name: The World
MajorArcana.interpretation: Completion, fulfillment, achievement. Recognize successes and enjoy the sense of wholeness. Opportunities for closure and satisfaction are present.
